title: Feature Importance v1
description: Feature importanceI will explore the importance of the features using Univariate. Plan of attck is as follows:  Reduce training data set down to last month only (i.e. May 2016) Clean data Split up the 24 products and compute feature importance for each product Summarise findings  This is my first attempt to compute feature importance, any comments and suggestions are welcome. If you find this notebook useful, I shall be grateful for any upvote :)
